html:
** Shares of diagnostic company SLGC.O rise 3.8% to $8.74

** SLGC says it expects 2022 revenue in range of about $105 mln to $110 mln, above Refinitiv IBES estimates of $103.5 mln (Full Story)

** SLGC, which has 'proteomics' platform designed to measure blood proteins and potentially help identify disease markers, had announced partnership with Illumina ILMN.O in Jan

** SLGC's efforts in diversifying its offerings coupled with increasing demand for proteomics services implies an "incredibly bright" future for company - CEO

** Including session moves, SLGC fell 14.7% since it went public in September through business combination with blank- check firm CM Life Sciences II Inc


(Reporting by Amruta Khandekar)

(( Amruta.Khandekar@thomsonreuters.com ;))
